languages.text: "Истинно так. Я не могу подумать о более великом завершении моего паломничества, чем литургия синхронизации с великим духом. Стать вместилищем для любимого дитя Омниссии, я сделаю шаг за пределы тленного бытия живых, в чертоги вечной песни машин".

"Indeed I have. I cannot think of a prouder end to my pilgrimage than the liturgy of synchronisation with the great spirit. I will become a vessel for the Omnissiah's favoured child and step beyond the confines of wretched living existence and into the halls of the eternal machine song."
languages.original_text: "Истинно так. Я не могу подумать о более великом завершении моего паломничества, чем литургия синхронизации с великим духом. Стать вместилищем для любимого дитя Омниссии, я сделаю шаг за пределы тленного бытия живых, в чертоги вечной песни машин".

I will become a vessel for the Omnissiah's favoured child and step beyond the confines of wretched living existence and into the halls of the eternal machine song."

languages.text: 「いかにも、持っている。私の聖地巡礼の終焉として、偉大なる精霊との共時性の儀式以上に誇れるものなど考えられない。私は万機神の寵児の船となり、哀れな生の存在の限界を超え、永遠の機械の歌の殿堂へと足を踏み出すのだ」
languages.original_text: "Indeed I have. I cannot think of a prouder end to my pilgrimage than the liturgy of synchronisation with the great spirit. I will become a vessel for the Omnissiah's favoured child and step beyond the confines of wretched living existence and into the halls of the eternal machine song."

traits.locale_text: 「いかにも、持っている。私の聖地巡礼の終焉として、偉大なる精霊との共時性の儀式以上に誇れるものなど考えられない。私は万機神の寵児の船となり、哀れな生の存在の限界を超え、永遠の機械の歌の殿堂へと足を踏み出すのだ」
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: “我确实是这么希望的。对我的朝圣之旅而言，能与伟大的机魂融为一体，恐怕没有比这更圆满的终点了。我将成为欧姆尼塞亚心爱子嗣的容器，跨过可悲的生命极限，融入永恒机器之歌的殿堂。”
languages.original_text: "Indeed I have. I cannot think of a prouder end to my pilgrimage than the liturgy of synchronisation with the great spirit. I will become a vessel for the Omnissiah's favoured child and step beyond the confines of wretched living existence and into the halls of the eternal machine song."

traits.locale_text: “我确实是这么希望的。对我的朝圣之旅而言，能与伟大的机魂融为一体，恐怕没有比这更圆满的终点了。我将成为欧姆尼塞亚心爱子嗣的容器，跨过可悲的生命极限，融入永恒机器之歌的殿堂。”
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: "Oh ja. Ich kann mir kein stolzeres Ende für meine Pilgerreise vorstellen, als die Liturgie der Synchronisation mit dem großen Geist. Ich werde zum Gefäß für das Lieblingskind des Omnissiah, lasse die Grenzen der verfluchten lebenden Existenz hinter mir und betrete die Hallen des ewigen Maschinenlieds."
languages.original_text: "Indeed I have. I cannot think of a prouder end to my pilgrimage than the liturgy of synchronisation with the great spirit. I will become a vessel for the Omnissiah's favoured child and step beyond the confines of wretched living existence and into the halls of the eternal machine song."

traits.locale_text: "Oh ja. Ich kann mir kein stolzeres Ende für meine Pilgerreise vorstellen, als die Liturgie der Synchronisation mit dem großen Geist. Ich werde zum Gefäß für das Lieblingskund des Omnissiah, lasse die Grenzen der verfluchten lebenden Existenz hinter mir und betrete die Hallen des ewigen Maschinenlieds."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: « C'est exact. Je ne peux imaginer de manière plus noble d'achever mon pèlerinage qu'en me synchronisant avec le grand esprit. Je deviendrai le réceptacle de l'enfant chéri de l'Omnimessie et transcenderai les limites de cette misérable existence pour rejoindre les rangs de l'éternel cantique de la machine. »
languages.original_text: "Indeed I have. I cannot think of a prouder end to my pilgrimage than the liturgy of synchronisation with the great spirit. I will become a vessel for the Omnissiah's favoured child and step beyond the confines of wretched living existence and into the halls of the eternal machine song."

traits.locale_text: « C'est exact. Je ne peux imaginer de manière plus noble d'achever mon pèlerinage qu'en me synchronisant avec le grand esprit. Je deviendrai le réceptacle de l'enfant chéri de l'Omnimessie et transcenderai les limites de cette misérable existence pour rejoindre les rangs de l'éternel cantique de la machine. »
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: «Ciertamente, así es. No se me ocurre un final más digno para mi peregrinación que la liturgia de la sincronización con el gran espíritu. Me convertiré en el avatar del hijo predilecto del Omnissiah y trascenderé los indignos confines de la existencia orgánica para adentrarme en los versos de la eterna canción de la máquina».
languages.original_text: "Indeed I have. I cannot think of a prouder end to my pilgrimage than the liturgy of synchronisation with the great spirit. I will become a vessel for the Omnissiah's favoured child and step beyond the confines of wretched living existence and into the halls of the eternal machine song."

traits.locale_text: «Ciertamente, así es. No se me ocurre un final más digno para mi peregrinación que la liturgia de la sincronización con el gran espíritu. Me convertiré en el avatar del hijo predilecto del Omnissiah y trascenderé los indignos confines de la existencia orgánica para adentrarme en los versos de la eterna canción de la máquina».
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: "Evet, sundum. Hac yolculuğumu sonlandırmak için yüce ruhla senkronizasyon ayininden daha şerefli bir yol düşünülemez. Hermesih'in iltimaslı çocuğuna konak olarak ezik, ölümlü varoluşun sınırlarını aşacak ve ebedî makine şarkısının çaldığı salonlara adım atacağım."
languages.original_text: "Indeed I have. I cannot think of a prouder end to my pilgrimage than the liturgy of synchronisation with the great spirit. I will become a vessel for the Omnissiah's favoured child and step beyond the confines of wretched living existence and into the halls of the eternal machine song."

traits.locale_text: "Evet, sundum. Hac yolculuğumu sonlandırmak için yüce ruhla senkronizasyon ayininden daha şerefli bir yol düşünülemezdi. Hermesih'in iltimaslı çocuğuna konak olarak ezik ölümlü varoluşun sınırlarını aşacağım ve ebedî makine şarkılarının koridorlarına adım atacağım."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek
